s: The outstanding producing talents of Neil Norman are evident here. Simmond's guitar playing is outstanding. Norman maybe had a hand in this. I saw Savoy Brown on cable about the time this album was made. I made note of the excellent vocal talents of Dave Walker.

t: SAVOY BROWN - Best Of: Savoy Brown - Amazon.com Music
s: Bought this album as an introduction to Savoy Brown, who are an outfit I‘m none too familiar with. As a fan of rock blues, all I can say is, how on earth did I not hear about you sooner. Thoroughly enjoyed this compilation, particularly the third ‘live’ disc.

t: Savoy Brown - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Savoy Brown (originally Savoy Brown Blues Band) were a British blues rock band formed in Battersea, southwest London, in 1965. Part of the late 1960s blues rock movement, Savoy Brown primarily achieved success in the United States, where they promoted their albums with non-stop touring.

t: SAVOY BROWN - Blue Matter - Amazon.com Music
s: I imagine this is as good as it's gonna get, so I do recommend the SHM version. (I'm assuming you know the music. If not, it's one of the top 3 Savoy Brown albums and a must-have.) Going to get SHM "Raw Sienna," probably leave it at that as I have good comp and some of the original vinyl.

t: Savoy Brown, Kim Simmonds & Savoy Brown - Live & Kickin - Amazon.com Music
s: Savoy Brown's brand of blues was so unique and recognizable. They never received the attention that they disserved in the U.S. These "live" performances show what great tunes they could deliver in concert.
